verbs.description: Trump [V: was] told acting on his health care ideas would make things worse for the public . Trump acted on his ideas . Things are now worse for the public .
[ARG2: Trump] was [V: told] [ARG1: acting on his health care ideas would make things worse for the public] . Trump acted on his ideas . Things are now worse for the public .
Trump was told [V: acting] [ARG1: on his health care ideas] would make things worse for the public . Trump acted on his ideas . Things are now worse for the public .
Trump was told acting on his health care ideas [V: would] make things worse for the public . Trump acted on his ideas . Things are now worse for the public .
Trump was told [ARG0: acting on his health care ideas] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: make] [ARG1: things worse for the public] . Trump acted on his ideas . Things are now worse for the public .
Trump was told acting on his health care ideas would make things worse for the public . [ARG0: Trump] [V: acted] [ARG1: on his ideas] . Things are now worse for the public .
Trump was told acting on his health care ideas would make things worse for the public . Trump acted on his ideas . [ARG1: Things] [V: are] [ARGM-TMP: now] [ARG2: worse for the public] .
